title: History of rugby union matches between Italy and Scotland
text: <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a> and <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> have played each other at <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> in 33 matches, with Scotland winning 25 times, Italy winning 8 times and no matches drawn. Their most recent encounter in March 2021 was won 52-10 by Scotland.
